Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise take up the challenge to pursue the Federation's most fearsome enemy and stop them from changing the future Jonathan Frakes - Director Patrick Stewart - Captain Jean-Luc Picard Jonathan Frakes - Commander William T Riker Brent Spiner - Lt Commander Data LeVar Burton - Lt Commander Geordi La Forge Michael Dorn - Lt Commander Worf Gates McFadden - Dr Beverly Crusher Marina Sirtis - Counselor Deanna Troi Alice Krige - Borg Queen James Cromwell - Zefram Cochrane Alfre Woodard - Lily Sloane Dwight Schultz - Lt Barclay Robert Picardo - Holographic doctor Neal McDonough - Lieutenant Hawk.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller, Fantasy ║ 1998 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Patrick Stewart and Jonathan Frakes. The planet Ba'ku holds magical properties that keep the population young and living in harmony. So when an alien race attempts to take over this paradise, it falls to Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise to defend the planet and its people Jonathan Frakes - Director Patrick Stewart - Captain Jean-Luc Picard Jonathan Frakes - Commander William T Riker Brent Spiner - Lt Commander Data LeVar Burton - Lt Commander Geordi La Forge Michael Dorn - Lt Commander Worf Gates McFadden - Dr Beverly Crusher Marina Sirtis - Counselor Deanna Troi F Murray Abraham - Ru'afo Donna Murphy - Anij Anthony Zerbe - Dougherty Gregg Henry - Gallatin.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Mystery, Children's ║ 1979 ║ PG
programme.desc: The first sci-fi adventure movie based on the cult TV series, starring William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy. An unknown and awesome force is heading towards Federation space, on a direct course for Earth. The USS Enterprise is ordered back into immediate service and, with Captain James T Kirk once again in command, sets out to confront the mysterious alien menace Robert Wise - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Mr Spock DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy Stephen Collins - Commander Willard Decker Persis Khambatta - Ilia James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Nichelle Nichols - Uhura Walter Koenig - Chekov Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Grace Lee Whitney - Janice Rand.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure sequel starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and Ricardo Montalban. In the 23rd century, Admiral James T Kirk is a guest aboard the Enterprise, which is taking part in a training exercise. But the routine voyage becomes a serious mission when his old ship is lured into a deadly trap, placing Kirk and his companions at the mercy of a crazed adversary, the formidable Khan Nicholas Meyer - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty Walter Koenig - Chekov George Takei - Sulu Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Bibi Besch - Dr Carol Marcus Merritt Butrick - David Paul Winfield - Captain Terrell Kirstie Alley - Saavik Ricardo Montalban - Khan Ike Eisenmann - Midshipman Peter Preston Judson Earney Scott - Joachim Weiss.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring William Shatner and DeForest Kelley. Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. However, the Vulcan's spirit is still with the crew, and back on the artificial Eden of the new Genesis planet his corpse is missing. Against orders, Admiral Kirk decides to lead the search for Spock and bring him home Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Uhura Christopher Lloyd - Kruge Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Merritt Butrick - David Marcus James B Sikking - Captain Styles Mark Lenard - Ambassador Sarek Leonard Nimoy - Spock.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Comedy, Fantasy ║ 1986 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. In the 23rd century, Captain Kirk and his intrepid band of space travellers discover a probe in the vicinity of Earth that is trying to contact a humpback whale, a species that is extinct. In order to prevent the probe destroying the planet, Kirk and his crew visit 1986 San Francisco in order to locate two whales to take back to the future Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Captain James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock Catherine Hicks - Dr Gillian Taylor DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Jane Wyatt - Amanda, Spock's mother Mark Lenard - Sarek Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Robert Ellenstein - Federal Council President John Schuck - Klingon ambassador.

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Fantasy, Thriller ║ 1989 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure based on the popular TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The captain and crew of the untested new starship Enterprise travel to the desolate world of Nimbus III after a Vulcan mystic kidnaps a group of Federation diplomats. programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 1991 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The original crew of the Enterprise is given one final mission, to oversee the integration of the Klingons, who claim they want peace, into the intergalactic Federation. programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jude Law and Jack Black. After breaking up with her boyfriend, Los Angeles workaholic Amanda is in need of a holiday. programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. programme.title: Arthur's Whisky

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Action, Comedy, Crime/detective, Mystery ║ 2001 ║ 12
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller, starring Jackie Chan as a salesman at a exercise equipment store, who has dreams of living a more adventurous life. His wish starts to come true when he follows two suspicious-looking men into an alley and jumps into action when he realises they are robbing a jewellery shop. The resulting publicity from his heroic act brings him to the attention of a private investigator, who convinces him that he is the long-lost son of a rich Korean businessman. programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Rekindling memories of an unforgettable 2021 season, Lewis Hamilton has pole position with Max Verstappen joining the Mercedes man on the front row at the 2023 Hungarian Grand Prix. (23.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Belgian Grand Prix sees the third of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag for a haul of championship points. (29.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Steeped in history, Spa is set for the next chapter to be written as the lights go out at the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix. Last year's race saw Max Verstappen head a Red Bull one-two. (30.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Fresh from a summer break, Formula 1 returns to a sea of orange for the 2023 Dutch Grand Prix, as Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes his homecoming as the world championship leader. (27.08).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Known as the Temple of Speed, Monza sets the stage for the 2023 Italian Grand Prix - the same stage Max Verstappen topped just a year ago. (03.09).

programme.title: Singapore F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. Carlos Sainz starts from pole position and George Russell joins him on the front row. (17.09).

programme.title: Japanese F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 Japanese Grand Prix starts here. Ahead of the McLarens, Max Verstappen returned to his imperious best to lock in pole. His Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez starts from P5. (24.09).

programme.title: Qatar F1 GP: Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth F1 Sprint of the season. Oscar Piastri starts from P1. (07.10).

programme.title: Qatar F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Lusail welcomes F1 racing once more. George Russell and Lewis Hamilton follow the newly crowned world champion Max Verstappen. (08.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP: Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind. (21.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third. (22.10).

programme.title: Mexico City F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's race day at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Taking place at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Charles Leclerc starts in pole with his Ferrari teammate Carlos Sainz in second. (29.10).

programme.title: PL Darts 2023: Sheffield
programme.desc: Sheffield's Utilita Arena hosts night 15 of Premier League Darts as MVG and Michael Smith clash, Gerwyn Price and Nathan Aspinall lock horns, and Chris Dobey meets Peter Wright. (11.05).

programme.title: BBL Qualifier Highlights
programme.desc: The top two sides in the 2023-24 Big Bash League contest this season's Qualifier. The winner secures progression to the final, while the loser gets another shot in the Challenger. (19.01).

programme.title: SA20: MI Cape Town v Paarl R
programme.desc: SA20 action between MI Cape Town and Paarl Royals. (19.01).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Dicaire
programme.desc: Natasha Jonas and Marie-Eve Dicaire go head to head in a super welterweight world title unification bout at the AO Arena in Manchester. (12.11).

programme.title: Super League Grand Final Hlts
programme.desc: In this year's Betfred Super League Grand Final, five-time winners Wigan Warriors meet Catalans Dragons at Old Trafford. The French side seek their maiden Super League title here. (14.10).

programme.title: ICC Men's U19 WC: SA v WI Hlts
programme.desc: Hosts of the 2024 ICC U19 Men's Cricket World Cup, South Africa, take on the West Indies. This 16-team tournament spans 41 matches over three weeks. (19.01).

programme.title: Live ICC Men's U19 WC: SCO v ENG
programme.desc: At the ICC U19 Men's Cricket World Cup 2024, Scotland face England during the group stages in South Africa. England made it all the way to the final in 2022, losing out to India. (20.01).

programme.title: UNBEATABLE
programme.desc: This weekly magazine show covers all the action of the British Basketball League including highlights of each week's games, original features, interviews, top plays and bloopers.

programme.title: Super League '23 Season Rewind
programme.desc: With the sun shining down on those in Perpignan, a dark cloud lingers over the Halliwell Jones as the Dragons cross the channel. Will a new face at the helm inspire the Wire? (04.08).

programme.title: Super League '23 Season Rewind
programme.desc: With just a four-point midtable gap, a win is vital for both sides and their playoffs aspirations. Can the Saints hold off last season's runners up in a Grand Final rematch? (28.07).

programme.title: Super League Grand Final Hlts
programme.desc: In this year's Betfred Super League Grand Final, five-time winners Wigan Warriors meet Catalans Dragons at Old Trafford. The French side seek their maiden Super League title here. (14.10).

programme.title: Live AFCON: Mauritania v Angola
programme.desc: Mauritania go toe to toe with Angola in group D at the Africa Cup of Nations, with both sides still on the hunt for their first victory. (20.01).

programme.title: WTA 500 Adelaide Final Highlights
programme.desc: The 2024 Adelaide International concludes with the women's singles final. (13.01).

programme.title: Super League '23 Season Rewind
programme.desc: With just a four-point midtable gap, a win is vital for both sides and their playoffs aspirations. Can the Saints hold off last season's runners up in a Grand Final rematch? (28.07).

programme.title: Best of F3 2023
programme.desc: With the starting grid determined by the results of Friday's qualifying, the seventh F3 Feature Race of the season begins in Hungary. (23.07).

programme.title: Best of F3 2023
programme.desc: With the starting grid determined by the results of Friday's qualifying, the eighth F3 Feature Race of the season begins at Spa. Zak O'Sullivan picked up the win last weekend. (30.07).

programme.title: BBL Knockout Highlights

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Rekindling memories of an unforgettable 2021 season, Lewis Hamilton has pole position with Max Verstappen joining the Mercedes man on the front row at the 2023 Hungarian Grand Prix.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 Belgian Grand Prix sees the third of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag for a haul of championship points.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Steeped in history, Spa is set for the next chapter to be written as the lights go out at the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix. Last year's race saw Max Verstappen head a Red Bull one-two.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Fresh from a summer break, Formula 1 returns to a sea of orange for the 2023 Dutch Grand Prix, as Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes his homecoming as the world championship leader.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Known as the Temple of Speed, Monza sets the stage for the 2023 Italian Grand Prix - the same stage Max Verstappen topped just a year ago.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. One of F1's strongest street performers Sergio Perez won here in last year.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights of the 2023 Japanese Grand Prix. Last year, this race proved to be a pivotal one in the championship, as Max Verstappen became a two-time world champion at Suzuka.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race to the chequered flag for a haul of world championship points.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Losail International Circuit welcomes Formula 1 racing once more. Lewis Hamilton took the chequered flag in P1 here back in 2021.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Seventy-one laps of the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez start here as the lights go out at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Max Verstappen has won the previous two races here.
